item.title: 01-VM-intro
item.description: self assessment pros cons of using sudo as set up on ubuntu most things can be done safely using non-root accounts protects you from accidental damage more secure very small con of having to enter password to do root commands How to ask questions the smart way

item.title: 03-2d-transforms

item.title: 05-feature-description-and-matching
item.description: last lecure: taking photographs and sticthcing them together. uses feature detection. identity interest points in image sequences. into homography matrix, map from one image into another

item.title: 06-homographies
item.description: Homographies and mosaics A homography* is: A linear map between two planes (or views of a plane) A 3 x 3 matrix, up to a scale Two images of a scene are related by a homography If the scene is planar, or If the camera only rotates Homographies for planar scenes
